status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Please design a maintenance page. The page should have no external resources (css, js, etc.); All such resources should be embedded in the maintenance page html

we need :
 - a specific maintenance page per sites
 - one url per sites (no grouping)
 - design should be cool, with logo, images
 - we can customize the messaging easily
 - no external css/js
 - should be packaged as assets
 - we should prevent the browser from caching it forever : no-cache, max-age=600, must-revalidate ([https://jakearchibald.com/2016/caching-best-practices/])
 - no link on the page, not even the logo. 

*Design:*

Please use the same design for all countries, but only update the language. 

Please update the footer to © 2014-2018 Marktplaats B.V. All rights reserved. 

Graphics for Desktop / mobile are attached (optimized for web)

 

+Translation for each site:+

*IE:* 

Desktop: [https://zpl.io/blpM43v]

Mobile: [https://zpl.io/bLO586M]

 

*PL:*

Waiting for translation by June 28. 

Desktop: [https://zpl.io/VOkdMvr]

Mobile: [https://zpl.io/VqEY87J]

Translation:
 W tej chwili Gumtree jest niedostępne z powodu prac konserwacyjnych. 
 Pracujemy nad tym, aby zapewnić jeszcze lepsze funkcje niż dotychczas. Sprawdź ponownie wkrótce. 
 © 2014-2018 Marktplaats B.V. Wszelkie prawa zastrzeżone.

 

*SG:*

Desktop: [https://zpl.io/anKkP3n]

Mobile: [https://zpl.io/bLO586M]

 
 *MX:*

Desktop: [https://zpl.io/a3qj60N]

Mobile: [https://zpl.io/V1qQWEk]

 

*AR:*

Desktop: [https://zpl.io/V0yglr9]

Mobile: [https://zpl.io/VDzKvjO]

Translation: alaMaula está fuera de servicio temporalmente debido a tareas de mantenimiento. 
 Estamos trabajando para mejorar aún más tu experiencia de compra y venta. Volvé a intentarlo pronto. 
 © 2014-2018 Marktplaats B.V. Todos los derechos reservados.

 

*ZA:* 

Desktop: [https://zpl.io/awY6B51]

Mobile: [https://zpl.io/boxMnpZ]
fields.summary: Add option for applications to register a custom server selector

comments.body:
This site describes how to convert an image into text that can then be planted inside the HTML:
http://www.greywyvern.com/code/php/binary2base64

Please let me know what the return code for the maintenance page should be (302? 307? etc)
can we get movement on this ticket? hasn't been touched for 2 weeks
can we get movement on this ticket? hasn't been touched  in more than a month.

[~halcerrecamartin]we need a desing from ashley first 
and then schedule te ticket ;)
[~aauld] Could Isabelle help with this one please?

[~halcerrecamartin][~rsemov] Isabelle is on it!  A few questions:

Do we want to say how long maintenance will be for or do we have expected amount of downtime to show?
Do we want to include any links to CS or anything along those lines?
[~rsemov] Could you help [~aauld] wit her questions?
no expected time for downtime - it's going to be a static maintenance page and we won't be updating it with any timelines. links to CS are not needed - they have them all bookmarked

[~halcerrecamartin]
I still need the HTML page and the image embedded inside the html as I described in the ticket. Keep in mind we need the same html file serving desktop as well as mobile requests

Create a logo for each page
Get proper text for every language

[~john], IE / PL / SG is still using old Gumtree branding instead of new one. Are you sure we will use ZA design for their maintenance?

Also AR's design is missing here and I don't think we can use the MX design for AR.

[~spliu] Thanks Spark. Ashley is helping to get the design updated for IE/PL/SF/AG ASAP. We will have separate designs later. 

[~aauld] Do you think we can have them ready by Wednesday SF time?

[~john] [~spliu]  Designs updated (except transations), and image assets uploaded for Desktop and Mobile.

 

FYI, I do not have source files for the surrounding UI for Gumtree old design and also AlaMaula.  I had to eyeball the design using screenshots from the live site in order to mock those pages.  I hope that will be sufficient as the only content you really need to build these screens is the page body content itself (the text and image).
[~aauld] Thanks Ashley! This is super helpful!
The translations are updated as well [~spliu]
[~rsemov] The maintenance page is uploaded. Please have a check on [^maintenance.zip]
Resolve the ticket as maintenance page have been uploaded.
what is the url?

[~cdehaudt] The maintenance page is uploaded as attached file maintenance.zip in this ticket, as Raymond requested.

We don't know how he will deploy the page and URL as result, if that's what you asked.
ok, cool! thank you guys!

 - design should be cool, with logo, images
 - we can customize the messaging easily
 - no external css/js
 - should be packaged as assets
 - we should prevent the browser from caching it forever : no-cache, max-age=600, must-revalidate ([https://jakearchibald.com/2016/caching-best-practices/])

*Design:*

Please use the same design for all countries, but only update the language. 

Please update the footer to © 2014-2018 Marktplaats B.V. All rights reserved.

Please design a maintenance page. The page should have no external resources (css, js, etc.); All such resources should be embedded in the maintenance page html

we need :
 - a specific maintenance page per sites
 - one url per sites (no grouping)
 - design should be cool, with logo, images
 - we can customize the messaging easily
 - no external css/js
 - should be packaged as assets
 - we should prevent the browser from caching it forever : no-cache, max-age=600, must-revalidate ([https://jakearchibald.com/2016/caching-best-practices/])

*Design:*

Please use the same design for all countries, but only update the language. 

Please update the footer to © 2014-2018 Marktplaats B.V. All rights reserved. 

Graphics for Desktop / mobile are attached (optimized for web)

 

+Translation for each site:+

*IE:* 

Desktop: [https://zpl.io/blpM43v]

Mobile: [https://zpl.io/bLO586M]

 

*PL:*

Waiting for translation by June 28. 

Desktop: [https://zpl.io/VOkdMvr]

Mobile: [https://zpl.io/VqEY87J]

Translation:
W tej chwili Gumtree jest niedostępne z powodu prac konserwacyjnych. 
Pracujemy nad tym, aby zapewnić jeszcze lepsze funkcje niż dotychczas. Sprawdź ponownie wkrótce. 
© 2014-2018 Marktplaats B.V. Wszelkie prawa zastrzeżone.


 

*SG:*

Desktop: [https://zpl.io/anKkP3n]

Mobile: [https://zpl.io/bLO586M]

 
 *MX:*

Desktop: [https://zpl.io/a3qj60N]

Mobile: [https://zpl.io/V1qQWEk]

 

*AR:*

Desktop: [https://zpl.io/V0yglr9]

Mobile: [https://zpl.io/VDzKvjO]

Translation: alaMaula está fuera de servicio temporalmente debido a tareas de mantenimiento. 
Estamos trabajando para mejorar aún más tu experiencia de compra y venta. Volvé a intentarlo pronto. 
© 2014-2018 Marktplaats B.V. Todos los derechos reservados.


 

*ZA:* 

Desktop: [https://zpl.io/awY6B51]

Mobile: [https://zpl.io/boxMnpZ]

Please design a maintenance page. The page should have no external resources (css, js, etc.); All such resources should be embedded in the maintenance page html

we need :
 - a specific maintenance page per sites
 - one url per sites (no grouping)
 - design should be cool, with logo, images
 - we can customize the messaging easily
 - no external css/js
 - should be packaged as assets
 - we should prevent the browser from caching it forever : no-cache, max-age=600, must-revalidate ([https://jakearchibald.com/2016/caching-best-practices/])
 - no link on the page, not even the logo.
